holidays.title: Feast of St. Anthony
holidays.description: The Feast of St. Anthony is observed annually to celebrate this beloved saint of the Church.

holidays.title: Feast of St. Anthony (Spain)
holidays.description: Today, we commemorate St. Anthony’s role in Christianity as we shower love on animals.

holidays.title: International Albinism Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let us express our support for albino individuals and make them feel good.

holidays.title: International Axe Throwing Day
holidays.description: This day allows ax throwers all around the globe to promote their passion.

holidays.title: Maharana Pratap Jayanti
holidays.description: Let's salute Maharana Pratap, the king who stood up against the might of the Mughals!

holidays.title: National Blame Someone Else Day
holidays.description: We’ve all had plenty of practice so it shouldn’t be a wildly daunting task.

holidays.title: National Chamoy Day
holidays.description: Enhance your palate by trying this versatile condiment on National Chamoy Day.

holidays.title: National Dance/Movement Therapy Advocacy Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Dance/Movement Therapy Advocacy Day to raise awareness about this unique type of psychotherapy.

holidays.title: National Jane Day
holidays.description: Name days are always fun, and National Jane Day, observed on June 13 every year in the U.S., is no different.

holidays.title: National Kitchen Klutzes of America Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates our occasional klutziness in the kitchen. It’s a day to have a good laugh!

holidays.title: National Productive Business Civility Day
holidays.description: Let’s come together for a more productive business and make the world a better place.

holidays.title: National Weed Your Garden Day
holidays.description: It’s National Weed Your Garden Day. Time to head to the garden and pull out those pesky weeds!

holidays.title: Random Acts of Light Day
holidays.description: Random Acts of Light Day celebrates any act of kindness to encourage someone with cancer.

holidays.title: World Softball Day
holidays.description: Get your composite bats ready, it's time to play a game of softball!

holidays.title: Chris Evans’s Birthday
holidays.description: The man the world knows as Captain America has done well for himself.

holidays.title: Jaden Newman’s Birthday
holidays.description: With plans to become the first woman in the N.B.A., Newman has no shortage of ambition.

holidays.title: Mary-Kate Olsen’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented fashion designer, actress, producer, and model, the sky's the limit.

holidays.title: Rumi Carter’s Birthday
holidays.description: This little girl isn’t just adorable; she’s also part of one of the most famous families!

holidays.title: Steve-O’s Birthday
holidays.description: The glory days of this multi-lingual television personality, and stuntman are far from over.
